top_stories.title: How to Transition From Data Analyst to Data Scientist
top_stories.description:
Playbook on how data analysts can become data scientists
The post How to Transition From Data Analyst to Data Scientist appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Egor Howell

top_stories.title: Trying to Stay Sane in the Age of AI
top_stories.description:
A machine learning engineer’s quiet way of not losing her mind
The post Trying to Stay Sane in the Age of AI appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Amy Ma

top_stories.title: Still no AI-powered, ‘more personalized’ Siri from Apple at WWDC 25
top_stories.description: Apple announced a slew of updates at the Worldwide Developer Conference with one notable exception. It still hasn't revealed its previously announced AI-powered Siri.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez

top_stories.title: OpenAI claims to have hit $10B in annual revenue
top_stories.description: OpenAI says it recently hit $10 billion in annual recurring revenue, up from around $5.5 billion last year.
top_stories.author: Kyle Wiggers

top_stories.title: From spatial widgets to realistic Personas: All the visionOS updates Apple announced at WWDC
top_stories.description: Apple’s updates to VisionOS 26, the operating system powering its mixed reality headset, build off last year’s Apple Vision Pro spatial computer that blends digital content with the physical world. At WWDC, Apple announced a range of updates for both consumer and enterprise customers, from new spatial widgets and content to more realistic Personas and more.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan
